title: How to Make Mashed Bean Burgers

steps.headline: Sauté the garlic, onion and eggplant.
Mash the black beans and tofu.
steps.description: Mix the spices into the mashed mixture.

steps.headline: Mix the sautéed mixture into the mashed mixture.
steps.description: Add the cornmeal and fold through until the mixture reaches a firm enough consistency to mould into burgers.

steps.headline: Mould the burgers.
steps.description: This is done the same way as moulding patties. Dust lightly with flour.

steps.headline: Place on a baking tray lined with baking paper.
steps.description: Place in the oven to bake for 15–20 minutes. Flip over halfway through the baking process.

steps.headline: Sauté the mushrooms with a little garlic and onion while the burgers are cooking.
steps.description: Arrange them on the side with the burgers and a salad, for a complete meal. This burger also goes really well with sweet potato fries.

text: Sauté the garlic, onion and eggplant.  Mash the black beans and tofu. Mix the spices into the mashed mixture. Preheat the oven to 375ºF  Mix the sautéed mixture into the mashed mixture. Add the cornmeal and fold through until the mixture reaches a firm enough consistency to mould into burgers. Mould the burgers. This is done the same way as moulding patties. Dust lightly with flour. Place on a baking tray lined with baking paper. Place in the oven to bake for 15–20 minutes. Flip over halfway through the baking process. Sauté the mushrooms with a little garlic and onion while the burgers are cooking. Arrange them on the side with the burgers and a salad, for a complete meal. This burger also goes really well with sweet potato fries. Finished.
